title: Does anyone or any website teach poor students freely online? - Quora

response.answer_text: There are tons of websites which provide free educational contents for anyone not just poor. Since you didn't mention what kind of educational content you are looking for eg( language in which course delivered, professional education or school education etc) I will mention few popular websites which provide free educational contents eg video lectures, articles, practice questions etc. Khan Academy This website has a lot of content for school students. The quality of content is so good that I still use it sometimes for polishing my basics.Unacademy - India's largest learning platform This web site has a lot of educational stuff related to competitive exams. You don’t need to pay high fees to training institutions everything is present here.edX for professional courses by best universities absolutely free.There are a lot of paid platform which will provide student free access, Fee waiver If you convince them your financial condition. The Internet has everything related to education at the free (or negligible cost compared to universities), the only requirement is the strong-willed student and a decent net connection.

Yes, there are a lot of online education platforms which are top most popular. What i preferring below website are free to learn but if you need certification you have to pay. edXKhan AcademyCoursera | Online Courses & Credentials by Top Educators. Join for FreeLearn the Latest Tech Skills; Advance Your Career | UdacityOnline Courses - Learn Anything, On Your Schedule | UdemyOnline Classes by Skillshare | Start for Free TodayThe Massachusetts Institute of Technology (MIT)
